entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView ItemTemplate Binding does not always display full string from model #20758
  • [net9.0] Not able to load net9 branch on VS Internal preview can't build Maps on windows #20753
    .NET 9 Planning
  • MAUI Blazor Android - click on any form element triggers click handler on submit button #20749
  • Feature switches don't work in Debug configuration #20747
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [XamlC] Improve code generated for x:Array #20745
    .NET 9 Planning
  • FilePicker on MacOs (MacCatalyst) returns null #20741
  • Support for latest renderer in Google Map #20740
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Android] In debug the app is way way slower than in xf #20739
  • The .NET MAUI Editor control does not scroll properly on iOS when enclosed in a Border control #20736

Closed

  • Gestures don't work on Label Spans #4734
    .NET 8 SR3
  • [net9.0] Not able to load net9 branch on VS Internal preview can't find libZipSharp #20752
    .NET 9 Planning
  • what is the obfuscator for maui? #20746
  • Microsoft.Maui.FileImageSourceService: Warning: Unable to load image file #20513
  • Custom Font is not fully supported on real Android Device #20744
  • Warning `XC0022` if using `FormattedText` from a `Label` #20633
    .NET 8 SR3
  • Unable to change color of BackButton icon in Shell #11127
    Backlog
  • FontImage glyphs are clipped on Android #16880
  • Excessive Increase in Image File Size Upon Saving in iOS platform #20724
  • Multiple Duplicate Scans Generated in Rapid Succession with Zebra EMDK #17031
  • MenuFlyoutItem Command Bindings and Clicked event no longer work on MacCatalyst #20737

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Handle ConnectionProfiles exception #20757
    platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞, potential-regression
  • [ci] Update azdo BuildNumber #20751
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix usage of feature switches in Debug mode #20748

Merged

  • [Windows] Implement gestures on Spans #17731
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-label, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • Setup Android App With More Accurate settings #20672
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] NativeAOT: Stand up UI testing on iOS platforms #20541
    area/testing
  • [X] Traverse ListNode when finding DataType #20742

Updated

  • [Android, iOS, Windows] Correctly scale Button image #19834
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Fix page swap from background #19532
    area/navigation 🧭
  • [Window] Fix transforms being offset by 0.5x0.5 #20454
    platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, partner
  • Clear logcat and set to a larger size #20732
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #20460
  • [net8.0] Update xharness #20712
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [ci] Enable 1ES PT #20728
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Span line height fix #20352
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-label
  • Fixed Shell.NavBarHasShadow on Android #20188
    platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Fix TabbedPage title displaying incorrectly #17039
    area/TabbedPage, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Testing] Updated to latest RC.5 of Appium #20694
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Call RootViewChanged when setting ContentView to null #20052
    area/shell 🐢
  • [net8.0.] Update net8.0 with main #20563
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Updated Development guide #20543
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Prepare the FabricBot config for migration to Policy Service #20540
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨
  • [iOS] Readonly Editor - Scrolling fix #20505
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-editor
  • [iOS] Double dash in input field crash fix #20584
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #20708
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net9.0] [testing] Enable Windows UITests back #20727
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [XC] Compile bindings with Source #20610
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Trimming] Use typed bindings internally #20567
    area/Xaml </>
  • Fixed Switch Thumb and On Colors #20346
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-switch
  • Remove Switch On/Off content #20487
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-switch
  • Android Shell BackButtonBehavior TextOverride #20179
    platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • SwipeGestureRecognizer return actual detected directions #20619
    community ✨, area/gestures
  • added Command and CommandParameter on CheckBox #20717
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-checkbox
  • [net9.0] [ci] Remove ForceNet8Current #20716
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix text toolbar item icon not removed when navigating on Android #16796
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/toolbar, Under Consideration
  • Propagate the app theme to all children #19931
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • - [Android] Fix ShouldShowToolbarButton for FlyoutPage #18522
    platform/android 🤖, area/FlyoutPage, community ✨
  • [Testing] Rework Appium Runner so that it goes directly to tests instead of navigates #20700
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added categories to Controls.AppiumTests #20642
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Correctly call DidFinishNavigation in NavigationDelegate #20725
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
